== Main Inclusion Report for thaifonts-scalable ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Rationale:'' Thai l10n support.
# ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries, just fonts.
** Does not open any port.

** Standard debhelper packaging.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
